EmailTemplate.name: KRA Missed Template 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Performance: KRA Missed For {!Goal__c.Resource__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Goal__c.Check_In_By__c},
We hope this message finds you well.
We regret to inform you that the KRA feedback for {!Goal__c.Goal_Name__c} was not submitted by mentee {!Goal__c.Resource__c} before the specified end date, therefore the system has updated your KRA record status to Missed.
Best Regards,
Cloud Peritus Team
